snippet: It was the swag-bags that convinced community health organizer Julia Liou to redraw the battle plan in a fight to reduce the hazardous chemical exposures of nail-salon workers, most of them low-paid Asian immigrant women....

headline.main: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol
headline.print_headline: Arkansas Legislator Wants to Pack Heat at State Capitol

lead_paragraph: It was the swag-bags that convinced community health organizer Julia Liou to redraw the battle plan in a fight to reduce the hazardous chemical exposures of nail-salon workers, most of them low-paid Asian immigrant women.
